# HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.thumbCMC

**Case**

A joint name that represents the thumb’s carpometacarpal (CMC) joint.

## Declaration

```swift
case thumbCMC
```

## Getting the thumb finger joint name

- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.thumbIP**: A joint name that represents the thumb’s interphalangeal (IP) joint.
- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.thumbMP**: A joint name that represents the thumb’s metacarpophalangeal (MP) joint.
- **HumanHandPoseObservation.JointName.thumbTip**: A joint name that represents the tip of the thumb.
